elements.name: To Perform the GET Operation on product DB to retrieve a list of products

steps.name: The base URI is "http://localhost:8090/medicare"
I perform the Get Operation
I receive the list of the products
Response code should be 200
I validate the products in UI and API are same

elements.name: To Perform the get Operation for most viewed products on product DB

steps.name: The base URI for most Viewed products is "http://localhost:8090/medicare"
I perform the get operation to get most viewed products
I receive the list of the most viewed products
I should receive response code as 200
I should receive the same list of products in UI and API

elements.name: To retrive the products from one category

steps.name: The base URI for one category products is "http://localhost:8090/medicare"
I perform the get operation to get one category products
I receive the list of the one category products
I should get response code as 200
I should receive the same list of products from one category in UI and API

name: To perform all the CRUD Operations in products API

elements.name: To insert a new category into the database

steps.name: The connection is built with the medicare database
I perform the insert quary to create a new category with name and description
I pass the statement quary to retrive the data from the category table
I check the new category is displayed in GUI
I close the driver

elements.name: To add a new user to the database

steps.name: The connection is built with the medicare database
I add a new user with all the required details
the new user should be added to the database
I close the driver

I close the driver

elements.name: To create a new category in GUI and validating the data from the database

steps.name: I have launched the application
I click on the Login Link
I send the admin credentials username as "vk@gmail.com" and password as "admin"
I click on the Login Button
I click on Manage Product
I click on Add New Category
I enter the category name as "Dermatology1" and description as "Drugs for the treatment of skin disease"

arguments.val: "Drugs for the treatment of skin disease"

steps.name: I click the save Button
I validate the new category name in the Category table in database
I delete the new Category entry
I close the driver

elements.name: To delete the new category and new user details from the database

steps.name: The connection is built with the medicare database
I perform the delete quary to delete the new category with name
I perform the delete quary to delete the new user details with email
the category should be deleted from the database
the user should be deleted from the database
I close the driver

elements.name: This scenario is to define the product page and placing the order path

validate I am on the Home page
I click on view product
validate I am on the product page
I click on Add to Cart icon to add one item to cart for 1st product
I click Continue Shopping
I click on Add to Cart icon to add one item to cart for 2nd product
I click on Checkout Button
validate I am on the Shipping address page
I enter the Shipping address details
I click on Add address Button
validate I am on the payment details page
validate the product names
I enter the card details
I click the pay button
I should get the order confirmed message "Your Order is Confirmed!!"
I have launched the application
I click on the Login Link
